nodes.text: The Intrepid was a Consular-class space cruiser in the Judicial Forces.

In 30 BBY, Jace Dallin piloted it from Coruscant to Kiffex, taking Jedi Masters Adi Gallia, Mace Windu, and Plo Koon to the prison world to retrieve the Jedi Aayla Secura and Tholme. On the journey back to Coruscant, Koon used his telepathy to help Secura recover her lost memory, while Dallin and the Jedi told her the story of the Stark Hyperspace War.
